mapper.sql: que_id, que_code, src, title, content, content_cn, note_head, note_below, read_id, test_type, subject, que_type, num_right, num_ans, len_sec, lev, lev_dk, ans, ans_rule, ans_order, num_file, art_desc, time_publish, org_id, user_create, time_create, status, score, time_update, read_top
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from que_question
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into que_question (que_id, que_code, src, title, content, content_cn, note_head, note_below, read_id, test_type, subject, que_type, num_right, num_ans, len_sec, lev, lev_dk, ans, ans_rule, ans_order, num_file, art_desc, time_publish, org_id, user_create, time_create, status, score, time_update, read_top) values (#{queId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{queCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteBelow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{testType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subject,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{queType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{numRight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAns,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lenSec,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lev,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levDk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ansRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ansOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numFile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{artDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timePublish,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{timeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readTop,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update que_question
que_id = #{record.queId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
que_code = #{record.queCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
src = #{record.src,jdbcType=BIGINT},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
